body.name: 5-Shelf Bookcase, Wooden Standing Rack Book Storage Shelves Furniture Selection for Living Room, Bedroom, Home Office (Cherry)
features: [Classic Style]: The simple and classic design allows the wooden bookcase to effortlessly blend into any decorating style. Places anywhere in your home for convenience and beauty.

[Sufficient Storage]: Five-tier open storage bookshelf provides ample storage space for organizing your favorite books and photos. It can also be used as a display stand to showcase your unique collections and beautiful decorations.
[Placement Space]: Perfect for use in a bedroom, living room or home office. Provides ample vertical storage without taking up too much floor space.
[Sturdy and Durable]: Made of engineered wood, this bookcase is built to last. The full contact ground base design is firm and stable.

[Easy to Assemble & Customer Service]: All accessories and instructions are well-included packages. If you have any question about this product or the assembly or need any help, don't hesitate to contact us.

productInformation.value: #142,452 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #349 in Bookcases

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these shelves and am so pleased with the quality. I literally almost cancelled my order after reading several negative reviews and am so glad I didn’t. And I hate taking time for reviews but want people to see how great they are. They’re super sturdy and can withstand the weight of all our books.I’m using them as home school shelves. They’re so much prettier than other cheap bookshelves- the trim makes it look way more expensive.Mine are true white- I know another reviewer received an off white but that wasn’t the case for me.Other reviewers also said there were 6 individual, difficult back panels and plastic pieces. They must’ve changed it because mine doesn’t have that, mine has 3 wider pieces (and I’m so glad there aren’t the cheap looking plastic pieces on mine).It was time consuming and mildly tricky, but no different than any other build your own furniture.My only complaints are that you can see the silver screws on the inside of the shelves and there’s a small gap on the trim of one shelf (all pictured in my review photos) but these wouldn’t cause me to hesitate purchasing.The depth of the shelf itself isn’t the full 11” but closer to 10”. The 11” depth includes the trim that kinda sticks out. It isn’t deep enough to fully fit every children’s book, but as you can see in the photos I posted it’s not a deal breaker. It does fit most children’s books fully. It’s very hard to find deep bookshelves that are also tall and these are deeper (and prettier) than like every other tall bookshelf I found (usually 9” deep).I definitely recommend!! I’ve gotten so many compliments on these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy furniture
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Nice finishes, looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It very nice and it is sturdy enough. I was able to assemble it on my own and no tools required. It comes with necessary tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars White isn’t true white
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is supposed to be white. The picture is solid white, but the actual product looks like white washed pine. I don’t love it, but by the time I noticed my husband had it halfway together. So, I’ll probably paint it down the road to match my other trim and shelves properly. I’m very annoyed. It was misrepresented, but it’s too late now. Not to mention it claims to be “real solid wood” and absolutely is not. It claims the shelves are 1.5” inches and they are not, they just have a facia board/trim. Literally nothing about this shelf is as advertised. In addition, it was extremely difficult to put together. Instead of a folding backing board, there are 6 pieces that are attached by slats that are near impossible to get all pieces attached to each other simultaneously, especially with the longer pieces that back the top. This thing is absolute junk. It’s a $30 Walmart shelf with a bunch of misadvertisement that makes it seem nicer but it’s not all all. Do not buy. It’s awful and so not worth $95.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Took me about 2 hours to do it myself, instructions say you need a buddy to help you put the upper half onto the lower half after you assemble them separately but if you want to do it yourself just assemble the upper half on top of the lower.A good chunk of that 2hr was putting in the back panels which are my only complaint about the assembly, the shelves on the back do not have predrilled holes so either drill them yourself or expect to waste a lot of time fiddling with screws.Overall the bookcase looks good and seems fairly sturdy, the shelves are held by 4 decent sized decent sized screws and 4 wood pegs, the screws go in about 1-1.5 inches into the shelf/walls and the pegs about 1 inch so these should be able to support a full shelf of books easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 3 of 5 shelves bend 1/3 inch when filled with books
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these to hold ... well books. The look nice when assembled. But when you put large books on the book shelves, 3 of the shelves develop a noticable bend immediately. That bend is about 1 cm at the center. Lightly loaded, there is no bend.Assembly was straight forward, with the exception of putting the back on the case. They have a cleaver design. Panels slide into a plastic connector. Unfortunately the fits between the panels and the connector is too tight. I assmebled two bookcases. One I actually had to sand down some of the panels to make them fit in the connector. In the second bookcase I got better at the fit and managed to do it without sanding. The instructions need to be improved on this last step.I will ultimately be replacing these bookshelves. In the mean time they are adaquate, even with the bending shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my 2nd bookshelf - everything was there. A little tricky putting the back on but aside from that I’m a big fan - great looking also. Used a cherry furniture marker as touch up and little needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son and his girlfriend. She was able to put it together by herself. Looks beautiful put together.
